Character_1.Name: Pikachu
Character_1.Character_Summary: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its agility and electric attacks. It is weak against Ground-type moves.

Move_1.Description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.

Move_3.Description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.

Move_4.Description: The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

Character_2.Name: Charizard
Character_2.Character_Summary: Charizard is a Fire/Flying-type Pokémon with powerful fire attacks and flight ability. It is weak against Water and Electric-type moves.

Move_1.Description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

Move_2.Description: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.

Move_3.Description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

Move_4.Description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire.
